Gavin Relly (A mụrụ n'afọ 1926 na Cape Town, Cape Province, Union of South Africa - nwụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 10 n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 1999 na Hermanus, Western Cape, South Africa) bụ onye ọchụnta ego South Africa na onye bụbu onye isi oche nke Anglo American

Nna nna ya bụ Sir Walter Stanford, onye rụrụ ụka siri ike mana o nweghị ihe ịga nke ọma maka nnwere onwe maka ndị obodo n'agbanyeghị agbụrụ ha ma ọ bụ ụcha ha na Mgbakọ Mba nke 1909, nke dugara na ịmepụta Union of South Africa n'okpuru usoro nke South Africa Act 1909. Relly gụrụ akwụkwọ na Diocesan College na Trinity College, Oxford tupu ọ jee ozi na Italy n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ. Ọ rụziri ọrụ maka Sir de Villiers Graaff, onye isi nke United Party. Ọ sonyeere Anglo American na 1949 wee bụrụ odeakwụkwọ onwe onye nke Harry Oppenheimer na mgbe e mesịrị nke Ernest Oppenheimer Ọ ga-emesị mepụta ebe a na-egwupụta ọla edo nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na Free State ma lekọta ịmepụta Highveld Steel na Vanadium. Ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche nke Anglo American na 1983.

O duuru otu ndị ọchụnta ego South Africa bụ ndị zutere onye nnọchi anya African National Congress a machibidoro iwu bụ Oliver Tambo na Lusaka, Zambia n'afọ 1985, na-eguzogide nrụgide sitere n'aka gọọmentị South Africa n'oge ahụ n'okpuru Onye isi ala South Africa PW Botha Julian Ogilvie Thompson nọchiri ya na 1990.
Relly nwụrụ n'ihi nsogbu site na ịwa ahụ obi ma nwunye ya Jane, na ụmụ ya Janis, Georgina na Giles lanarịrị ya.
